Run Ubuntu (novnc) with nvidia driver

```
sudo docker run --gpus all -p 6080:80 -v /dev/shm:/dev/shm dorowu/ubuntu-desktop-lxde-vnc
```
Access terminal remotely from host

```
sudo docker exec -i -t {CONTAINER_ID} /bin/bash
```

Install Anaconda

```
wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-py37_4.8.2-Linux-x86_64.sh
```

```
chmod +x Miniconda3-py37_4.8.2-Linux-x86_64.sh
```

```
bash ./Miniconda3-py37_4.8.2-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -f -p /usr/local
```

```
python

import sys
sys.path.append('/usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/')
```

Install GIT and GCC

```
apt update 

apt install -y git gcc
```

Clone Repository

```
git clone --branch ubuntu_docker https://github.com/ErivanDev/OnePose.git

cd OnePose
```

Create ENV

```
conda env create -f environment.yaml
```

Install colmap

```
wget http://mirrors.kernel.org/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/glew/libglew2.0_2.0.0-5_amd64.deb

wget https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+archive/primary/+files/colmap_3.4-1_amd64.deb

apt install -y ./libglew2.0_2.0.0-5_amd64.deb

apt install -y ./colmap_3.4-1_amd64.deb

colmap -h
```

Download Data

```
curl 'https://ufcbr-my.sharepoint.com/personal/erivan_alu_ufc_br/_layouts/15/download.aspx?SourceUrl=%2Fpersonal%2Ferivan%5Falu%5Fufc%5Fbr%2FDocuments%2F0408%2Dcolorbox%2Dbox%2Ezip' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:105.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/105.0' -H 'Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8' -H 'Accept-Language: pt-BR,pt;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, br' -H 'Referer: https://ufcbr-my.sharepoint.com/personal/erivan_alu_ufc_br/_layouts/15/onedrive.aspx?skipSignal=true&id=%2Fpersonal%2Ferivan%5Falu%5Fufc%5Fbr%2FDocuments%2F0408%2Dcolorbox%2Dbox%2Ezip&parent=%2Fpersonal%2Ferivan%5Falu%5Fufc%5Fbr%2FDocuments' -H 'Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1' -H 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: iframe' -H 'Sec-Fetch-Mode: navigate' -H 'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin' -H 'Connection: keep-alive' -H 'Cookie: MicrosoftApplicationsTelemetryDeviceId=78b81833-893c-c8c7-1f93-db8fd8fb25eb; MicrosoftApplicationsTelemetryFirstLaunchTime=1664898528145; MSFPC=GUID=209f35fb6a624ed58aeeef1e784588bf&HASH=209f&LV=202210&V=4&LU=1664810458844; KillSwitchOverrides_enableKillSwitches=; KillSwitchOverrides_disableKillSwitches=; nSGt-; nSGt-; nSGt-; nSGt-; nSGt-; ; SIMI=eyJzdCI6MH0=; ; cucg=1' --output 0408-colorbox-box.zip
```
